attributes.action: Have a law so there is a minimum height to drive certain cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I saw a woman who was under 5ft driving a large 4x4. I couldn't see her driving at all. If I couldn't see her, what could she see?

It's about time the govt introduces a law where a minimum height is required to drive certain cars. It's very dangerous if drivers cannot see at all or through the gap between the middle and the top of the steering wheel.

If they do wish to drive such cars, the cars need to be adapted at the dealership
